news.title: Riots over LHC safety
news.description: Geneva under siege. Some folks with common sense are trying to stop LHC's madness.
news.content: For more than a year we have heard about the political issues regarding LHC arrangements. All those remarked obstacles related on economy and politics that were used, as claimed by some voices, to cover LHC's real danger which is their experiments and the chain reaction that might not be controllable. Many people will call them insane, but YOU KNOW NOTHING! THAT SHITS IS DANGEROUS, WE ARE ABOUT TO DIE.
